  • Field Details

    • enPassantVulnerable

      public boolean enPassantVulnerable
      Boolean value representing if the Pawn is vulnerable to an en passant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pawn

      public Pawn​(int row, int column, int team)
      Constructor for Pawn.
      Parameters:
      row - Starting row/rank.
      column - Starting column/file.
      team - The piece's team. Should be either ChessPiece.BLACK or ChessPiece.WHITE.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public boolean move​(int newColumn, int newRow)
      Description copied from class: ChessPiece
      Method for moving a piece based on a piece's unique way of generating a moveset. IMPORTANT: THIS MUST BE OVERRIDEN FOR PAWN AND KING SINCE THEY HAVE EXTRA PROPERTIES TO CHANGE AFTER A MOVE!
      Overrides:
      move in class ChessPiece
      Parameters:
      newColumn - The piece's column after the move.
      newRow - The piece's row after the move.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value based on if the user has made a valid move.

    • move

      public boolean move​(int newColumn, int newRow, java.lang.String promote)
      Moves the Pawn. Includes special logic that allows for en passant and promotion.
      Parameters:
      newColumn - The piece's column after the move.
      newRow - The piece's row after the move.
      promote - String representing the new class of the promoted pawn.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value based on if the user has made a valid move.

    • getValidMoves

      public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getValidMoves()
      Description copied from class: ChessPiece
      Returns the set of valid moves available to a piece.
      Specified by:
      getValidMoves in class ChessPiece
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of coordinate pairs, each representing a valid move.
